body:
### Welcome to the Konami Code iOS page.
This is the official page for my Konami Code iOS project. The project was create specifically because I hadn't seen any open source code to add the Konami Code Easter egg to one of my iPhone apps. 

### Authors and Contributors
As of 2012, I, Erran Carey (@ipwnstuff)  am the only person to touch this code as of my knowledge. Hit me up to contribute to the code because it was just a little Easter egg I added to my app Bomb Unit.

### Support or Contact
If your having trouble with any part of my Konami Code iOS source code get in contact with me! I'll be sure to make some documentation at a later date for now  contact me at e@ipwnstuff.com or [@ipwnstuff](http://www.twitter.com/#!/ipwnstuff) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
name: Konami Code
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: An iOS homage to the Konami Code
